name: Haunted (itch) (ErmendQ)
description:
This is a funmade, in development, horror, endless runner game, featuring some of the most iconic creepypastas: Eric Knudsen's Slenderman, and in the future Trevor Henderson's Sirenhead

Your goal is to make it as far in the woods as you can, away from your chaser/stalker, but as your lightsource fades, things will get harder.
